scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.start-ts: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "npm run backend-ts" "npm run frontend"
scripts.dev-ts: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "npm run backend-ts" "npm run frontend"
scripts.frontend: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run dev
